about_the_game:
✦ "With every wave, a new adventure..." ✦


Near the edges of a seaside town, where salty breezes kiss skin and a radiant sun shines on the horizon, an enchanting cafe emerges... Owned and operated by a spirited young witch, every pastry she serves has a singular purpose: to spread boundless joy and compassion throughout the world.

Enter the world of Pearlglow Cafe: Sweet Crumb Kisses and guide Juniper as she embarks on a charming journey filled with new beginnings and the delectably magical treats she whips up - all served with a side of romance as you get closer to the townsfolk who frequent her store.

✦ "Let me tell you about the love you will find in this world...and the magic it will bring." ✦



Play as Juniper Brooks, a charming, compassionate, and gentle witch setting out on a new adventure. With seven unique townsfolk to meet, who will you get to know first?

🥕 Graham Reed - The Surly Farmer
🍁 Briar Ash - The Eccentric Naturalist
🌑 Aspen Sterling - The Mysterious Writer
🌊 Sunny Crest - The Bold Sailor
🪙 Opaline G. Honeybell - The Shrewd Investor
♔ Rigel Bismark - The Reliable (and retired!) Mayor
🛏️ Cranesbill Wells - The Friendly Innkeeper

✦ "Ready? Then... What will you serve today?" ✦


🌞 An Interactive and Immersive Cookbook: unlock 20+ different recipes, select your cafe's daily magical special and read recipe notes from previous generations of witches, with many possible story variations based on your chosen recipe.
🌞 Three Unique Romance Routes: experience three cozy and heartwarming romances as you build unforgettable connections with your customers or stay happily single!
🌞 Unique Unlockable Moments: each romance route has unlockable gorgeous illustrations depicting romantic moments between Juniper and the other characters
🌞 User Choices: immersive and realistic player choices allow you to shape Juniper's story and her reactions to the zany antics that transpire around her
🌞 Planned 2-3 hours of story for each romance route

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Step through the magical doors of Pearlglow Cafe, a cozy otome visual novel about new beginnings, gentle romances, and the power of food. Experience life as Juniper Brooks as you choose your cafe's daily special and build relationships with the vibrant townsfolk.
